title: LTB Mathewson White Cap as well as upgrade the following cards
author: Maxjacks

posts.post_title: LTB Mathewson White Cap as well as upgrade the following cards
posts.post_content:
Looking to finish my New York Nationals team set the only card I need is the Mathewson white cap, hoping to get it in an SGC 30.


The following cards I already have but would like to upgrade to SGC 45-60 range 
Doc Crandall No Cap
Chief Myers batting
Admiral Schlei Batting 
Fred Snodgrass Batting 
Hooks Wiltse No Cap

I do have some duplicates available to trade so hopefully we can work something out. Please PM me or send me an email at [url]maxjacks89@yahoo.com[/url]
I was watching a white cap myself the other night, but went out of what I feel comfortable  paying for it.  Good luck Max! You going to do a video showing the set when you are done?
So far I've upgrade two cards! Right now all I want for Christmas is to finally finish the set with a nice Mathewson please help!
